text: Kandɨhɨrɨvɨ hañɨ Herot pɨrɨvɨsa Galilindu gavamandu aru miku kɨyɨmi. Kamata Jisas muhɨmɨmuhɨm nzihɨsihɨ andɨmi vana ha indarɨmi.14.1 Herot kanɨma, mu ñɨmbi nuŋandɨ Antipas, pɨrɨvɨsa Galili karatamandi. Herot kandɨhama nɨŋuvandu ñɨmbi Herot. Nɨŋuva Herot Aru miku kɨyɨmi hɨrɨvɨyɨ, Maria Jisasɨŋ kavumi. Matyu 2yɨ ŋgɨmandɨra.
